t: Readerlink Acquires Activity Publisher Dreamtivity - Printers Row Publishing Group
s: June 1, 2021 - Readerlink Distribution Services has acquired the Dreamtivity brand and assets from Retail Centric Marketing, which is based in Franklin, Tenn. Dreamtivity will become an imprint of Readerlink’s San Diego-based publishing arm, Printers Row Publishing Group, and will continue to operate from ...
